comments.body: I have updated the max pool to the new interface as well(The CMSIS part wasn't ready when I first made this PR).

We should be able to keep this const. The background why I introduced this hack for avg pool is that we use a non-const input there (we'll fix it soon). For maxpool, we use a const input. Sorry for the confusion!
After a second look. The max pooling input is also non-const. I removed the comments. We'll fix that soon.
Sounds goodâ€”I played around a bit to see if I could get it to work const and then noticed you had the same issue with avg.
